short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With the Just Rewards browser extension, you can earn real money by creating content about the things you love.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Whether it’s a screenshot you’ve captured, a video guide you’ve made, or a hot take on a new trailer, your contributions can earn rewards.

Brought to you by the team behind Just About (justabout.com), we work with leading names in gaming to recognize communities for their passion and expertise.

Install the Just Rewards extension and get notified whenever you visit a site with available opportunities.

🎮 Gaming, film, TV, music, sports, and more – reward opportunities are available across all your interests, with new options added daily.

🤝 Just About is trusted by top names in gaming. We run community rewards programs for Farming Simulator, EVE Online, Elite Dangerous, SMITE 2, and more.

💵 Users have already earned tens of thousands of dollars! Monthly payments are processed automatically for users with connected PayPal accounts and earnings over $25.

📱 Create on your preferred platforms – just connect YouTube, TikTok, or other social accounts to monetize through Just Rewards.

🚫 We respect your privacy. The extension only collects anonymized data related to reward opportunities and does not track activity outside the Just Rewards ecosystem.

For more information you can see our full policies and open-source code here:

Code of Conduct
https://justabout.com/just-about/32426/code-of-conduct

Open-source Codebase
https://github.com/Just-about/just-rewards-oss

Privacy Policy
https://about.justabout.com/privacy

Copyright Policy
